info.title: Jokes
info.description: The WebKnox Jokes API allows you to access over 30,000 jokes, from Knock Knock puns to Chuck Norris jokes you will find a lot to laugh about.

get.description: Find jokes with given search criteria.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that must occur in the joke.

parameters.name: minRating
parameters.description: The minimum rating of the joke between 0 and 10.

parameters.name: numJokes
parameters.description: The number of jokes, between 0 and 10.

parameters.name: maxLength
parameters.description: The maximum number of characters in the joke.

get.description: Get a random one liner. This is usually a funny quote or an interesting observation.
Insult a person that deserves to be insulted.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The reason why the person should get insulted.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the person that should be insulted.

get.description: Praise a person that deserves to be praised with random phrases.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: The reason why the person deserves to be praised.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the person that deserves to be praised.
